duties_responsibilities.duty: Reading Setup sheets to determine the required materials, resin, machine speeds and quality requirements
Reading Production orders and understanding their requirements
Quality inspections during the product run
Reading measuring devices such as a tape measure and calipers
Shutdown completed products and Setup for new product runs
Clean production tooling and equipment with acetone
Install and adjust clamping pads on the Pultrusion machine(s) pullers to assure proper pressure to avoid slipping or cracking
Operate the control panel on the Pultrusion machine(s)
Demonstrate proper shut down procedures when order is complete
All staff will be cross trained in another area on our plant floor
Other duties as assigned by your supervisor or management.
